author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR modernizes the ESProducers in CalibTracker/SiPixelESProducers (as part of #26748) by

- moving contents of the headers to the corresponding source files
- using ESGetToken (except for SiPixelGenErrorDBObjectESProducer and SiPixelTemplateDBObjectESProducer that have a non-trivial aspect in them and are dealt separately in #27043)
- reducing object copies in PixelFedChannelCollectionProducer

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, no changes expected.
title: Modernize ESProducers in CalibTracker/SiPixelESProducers
